Name: New York Official Song
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the adoption of an official song of the city of New York.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      	Section 1.  Chapter 1 of title 2 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding thereto a new section 2-103.1 to read as follows:
	�2-103.1  Official city song.  a.  The following song is hereby adopted as the official song of the city of New York:
Theme from New York, New York
Lyrics by Fred Ebb
Music by John Kander
Written in 1977

Recorded by Frank A. Sinatra, September 19, 1979 
Don Costa, Arranger

Copyright to song held by EMI Unart Catalogue Inc.
Master rights to Sinatra Version held by Reprise Records.

	�2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.

TNN/tnn
LS# 553
05/20/98
